thread.title: Sam & Associates Insurance Agency Kicks Off Charity Program in San Francisco, CA, and Initiates Campaign in Support of Sunset Neighborhood Beacon Center
thread.title_full: Sam & Associates Insurance Agency Kicks Off Charity Program in San Francisco, CA, and Initiates Campaign in Support of Sunset Neighborhood Beacon Center - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Sam & Associates Insurance Agency Kicks Off Charity Program in San Francisco, CA, and Initiates Campaign in Support of Sunset Neighborhood Beacon Center
text:
The Sam & Associates Insurance Agency launches a local charity program in the San Francisco, CA, area engaging the support of the agency’s network of clients and business partners in benefiting the local community. Its first campaign will raise funds to help Sunset Neighborhood Beacon Center.
San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) September 23, 2015
The Sam & Associates Insurance Agency in San Francisco, CA has announced the commencement of a master charity program created to assist the local community. Selecting a new beneficiary every 60 days, the agency will work closely with nonprofit organizations in the area. Their hope is to bring community awareness to important local causes by forming campaigns which aid worthy individuals, families or programs with fundraising and other support.
Yumi Sam, the agency’s principal, has chosen to introduce Sunset Neighborhood Beacon Center (SNBC) to debut the new Community Program. The campaign’s objective is to assist this worthy organization in their mission to bring free, high quality educational leadership programs to local residents.
“We understand just how critical it is to help the people of our community in any way we can,” said Yumi Sam, owner of the Sam & Associates Insurance Agency. “We hope to pull the community together in support of those who need it most and are happy to launch our Community Program by helping SNBC to provide people with opportunities for growth and leadership.”
Each featured campaign will have a donations page with a fully detailed story, spotlighting the current cause. The Sam & Associates Insurance Agency will also spread the word through its own database of thousands of customers, business partners, staff, neighbors and friends. To join the agency in support of SNBC, donors are encouraged to visit https://www.crowdrise.com/thesunsetsbutthebeac/fundraiser/yumisam and to share it with their friends and family through social media and email.
The Sam & Associates Insurance Agency also produces a monthly publication, Our Hometown magazine, which reserves a full page highlighting the details of each selected worthy cause. The electronic Flipbook version of the current issue of the magazine may be accessed here: http://agencysam.com/Our-Hometown-Magazine_41 .
More information about the agency’s Community Program and various services may be found at http://agencysam.com/ and information on Sunset Neighborhood Beacon Center may be accessed here: http://snbc.org/ .
About The Sam & Associates Insurance Agency
Agency owner Yumi Sam knows many local families and her knowledge and understanding of the people in her community help him to provide her customers with an outstanding level of service. Yumi and her team look forward to helping families protect the things which are most important to them - family, home, car and more. They can also help clients prepare a strategy to achieve their financial goals. To contact a caring expert at the Sam & Associates Insurance Agency, please call 415-665-0181.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/san-francisco-ca-charity/snbc-education-leadership/prweb12977445.htm
